name: USA Major Cities
description: <span style="font-family:&quot;Avenir Next W01&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next W00&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next&quot;, Avenir, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size:16px;">This layer presents the locations of major cities within the United States with populations of </span><span style="font-family:&quot;Avenir Next W01&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next W00&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next&quot;, Avenir, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:inherit;">approximately</span> 10,000 or greater, state capitals, and the national capital.</span><span style="font-family:&quot;Avenir Next W01&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next W00&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next&quot;, Avenir, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size:16px;"> Major Cities are locations containing population totals from the 2020 Census.</span><div><span style="font-family:&quot;Avenir Next W01&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next W00&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next&quot;, Avenir, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size:16px;"><br /></span></div><div><span style="font-family:&quot;Avenir Next W01&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next W00&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next&quot;, Avenir, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size:16px;">The points represent U.S. Census Places polygons sourced from </span><a href="https://www.census.gov/geographies/mapping-files/time-series/geo/tiger-geodatabase-file.2020.html" style="color:rgb(0, 97, 155); text-decoration-line:none; font-family:&quot;Avenir Next W01&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next W00&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next&quot;, Avenir, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size:16px;" target="_blank">U.S. Census Bureau 2020 TIGER FGDB (National Sub-State)</a><span style="font-family:&quot;Avenir Next W01&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next W00&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next&quot;, Avenir, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size:16px;">. </span><span style="font-family:&quot;Avenir Next W01&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next W00&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next&quot;, Avenir, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size:16px;">Attribute fields include 2020 total population from the </span><a href="https://www.census.gov/data/datasets/2020/dec/2020-census-redistricting-summary-file-dataset.html" style="color:rgb(0, 97, 155); text-decoration-line:none; font-family:&quot;Avenir Next W01&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next W00&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next&quot;, Avenir, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size:16px;" target="_blank">U.S. Census Public Law 94 data</a><span style="font-family:&quot;Avenir Next W01&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next W00&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next&quot;, Avenir, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size:16px;"> that symbolize the city points using these six classifications:</span><span style="font-family:&quot;Avenir Next W01&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next W00&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next&quot;, Avenir, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size:16px;"><br /></span></div><div><span style="font-family:&quot;Avenir Next W01&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next W00&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next&quot;, Avenir, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size:16px;"><br /></span></div><div><div style="font-family:&quot;Avenir Next W01&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next W00&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next&quot;, Avenir, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:inherit;">     Class   Population Range</span></div><div style="font-family:&quot;Avenir Next W01&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next W00&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next&quot;, Avenir, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:inherit;">         5             2,500 – 9,999</span></div><div style="font-family:&quot;Avenir Next W01&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next W00&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next&quot;, Avenir, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:inherit;">         6           10,000 – 49,999<br /></span></div><div style="font-family:&quot;Avenir Next W01&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next W00&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next&quot;, Avenir, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:inherit;">         7           50,000 – 99,999</span></div><div style="font-family:&quot;Avenir Next W01&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next W00&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next&quot;, Avenir, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:inherit;">         8         100,000 – 249,999</span></div><div style="font-family:&quot;Avenir Next W01&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next W00&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next&quot;, Avenir, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:inherit;">         9         250,000 – </span>499,999</div><div style="font-family:&quot;Avenir Next W01&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next W00&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next&quot;, Avenir, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:inherit;">       10         500,000 and over</span></div></div><div style="font-family:&quot;Avenir Next W01&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next W00&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next&quot;, Avenir, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:inherit;"><br /></span></div><div style="font-family:&quot;Avenir Next W01&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next W00&quot;, &quot;Avenir Next&quot;, Avenir, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size:16px;">This ready-to-use layer can be used in ArcGIS Pro and in ArcGIS Online and its configurable apps, dashboards, StoryMaps, custom apps, and mobile apps. The data can also be exported for offline workflows. Cite the 'U.S. Census Bureau' when using this data.<span style="font-family:inherit;"><br /></span></div>
copyrightText: Sources: Esri; U.S. Department of Commerce, Census Bureau; U.S. Department of Commerce (DOC), National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), National Ocean Service (NOS), National Geodetic Survey (NGS)

fields.name: CLASS
fields.description: {"value":"The U.S. Department of Commerce, Census Bureau class of the city.","fieldValueType":"typeOrCategory"}

fields.name: STATE_ABBR
fields.description: {"value":"The two-letter abbreviation for the state in which the city is located.","fieldValueType":"uniqueIdentifier"}

fields.name: STATE_FIPS
fields.description: {"value":"The code (two-digit number) for the state in which the city is located.","fieldValueType":"uniqueIdentifier"}

fields.name: PLACE_FIPS
fields.description: {"value":"The combined state and populated place Census codes. Use the combined code (seven-digit number) to uniquely identify a city.","fieldValueType":"uniqueIdentifier"}

fields.name: POP_CLASS
fields.description: {"value":"The code for the 2020 population class of the city.","fieldValueType":"typeOrCategory"}

fields.name: POP_SQMI
fields.description: {"value":"The 2020 population of the city per square mile.","fieldValueType":"measurement"}

fields.name: SQMI
fields.description: {"value":"The area of the city in square miles using the North America Albers Equal Area Conic projection.","fieldValueType":"measurement"}
